main event: A civilian observed a blue and white object resembling a pea with intense light in Minot, North Dakota on August 8, 1958.
interesting points: The object emitted intense light similar to that of a star before fading with distance., The sighting lasted for approximately 15-20 seconds., The observer noted it was likely a meteor from the Perseids meteor shower., Weather conditions were very clear at the time of the sighting., The observer was accompanied by five companions who also witnessed the object.
sighted object: blue and white object with intense light
